oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Troy Gibson, Tennessee National Guard, with boxes of water in Saudi Arabia, circa 1990 November 15
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Troy Gibson, a Middle Tennessee State University student serving in the Tennessee National Guard, who stands outside a tent surrounded by boxes of water. The photograph was taken by Nashville Banner photographer Larry McCormack on assignment in Saudi Arabia in November 1990. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph transparency : col ; 35mm.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gibson, Troy
